inclusion.criterion: no previous diagnosis of rhythm disorder
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: on examination on the ECG, the patient was not in sinus rhythm
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: the patient has a known heart rhythm disorder and / or is being treated for it
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient with history of CAD, MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after negative work-up for syncope.
